source_sentence: MinRex Resources Limited (ASX: MRR) is an Australian based ASX-listed gold and base metals explorer with highly prospective gold and base metals projects in the Lachlan Fold Belt of NSW. The Company's portfolio comprises around 438kmÂ² of tenements, including the Sofala Gold Project (NSW) which hosts JORC 2012 Resources totalling 352,000 oz gold.
